decks.notes: The main concept of this Eldrazi Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful Eldrazi creatures and disrupt their strategy with cards like Chalice of the Void and Thought-Knot Seer. The deck aims to play aggressively, using cards like Reality Smasher and Glaring Fleshraker to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The mana base is optimized to support the high mana costs of Eldrazi creatures, while also including disruptive lands like Wasteland. Overall, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early and maintain control of the game with its powerful creatures and disruptive elements.

The deck focuses on utilizing efficient spells and creatures to control the board while applying pressure to the opponent's life total. By utilizing countermagic, disruptive creatures, and efficient removal spells, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while developing its own board presence. The key strategy revolves around using cards like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Questing Druid to apply pressure while using control elements like Force of Will and Counterbalance to protect its threats. The deck aims to maintain tempo and card advantage to overpower the opponent and secure a victory.

This Dragon Stompy deck focuses on fast, aggressive plays to disrupt the opponent's mana base. By using cards like Blood Moon and Magus of the Moon to control the opponent's lands, the deck aims to bring out powerful creatures like Pyrogoyf and Broadside Bombardiers quickly to overwhelm the opponent. Chalice of the Void is used to further disrupt the opponent's game plan, while cards like Chrome Mox and Simian Spirit Guide help accelerate the deck's mana curve. With a focus on speed and disruption, this deck aims to close out games quickly before the opponent can recover.

The main idea of this Dragon Stompy deck is to utilize powerful aggressive creatures like Broadside Bombardiers and Magus of the Moon to disrupt opponents' mana bases and quickly close out the game with efficient threats. Chalice of the Void and Blood Moon further disrupt opponents' strategies, while cards like Pyrogoyf and Sundering Eruption provide additional damage and removal options. The deck also includes acceleration in the form of Chrome Mox and Simian Spirit Guide, allowing for explosive starts. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure early and control the game through disruption.

This deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while quickly deploying threats to pressure the opponent's life total. By combining disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Daze with efficient removal like Fatal Push, the deck seeks to control the tempo of the game. The creatures in the deck, such as Nethergoyf and Murktide Regent, provide powerful threats that can close out the game quickly. With a combination of counter magic and efficient creatures, this deck aims to outmaneuver the opponent and secure victory through a combination of disruption and aggression.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan while quickly applying pressure with efficient creatures and tempo plays. By using cards like Thoughtseize and Daze to disrupt the opponent's hand and spells, combined with powerful threats like Murktide Regent and Nethergoyf, the deck aims to control the game and close it out before the opponent can recover. The deck also includes cards like Brazen Borrower and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student to provide additional disruption and card advantage. The mana base is optimized for consistency and includes powerful lands like Wasteland and Underground Sea.

The deck focuses on quickly and efficiently emptying the entire library by casting a high number of spells in a single turn. Cards like Dark Ritual, Lotus Petal, and Simian Spirit Guide provide mana acceleration, while cards like Balustrade Spy and Undercity Informer help mill the entire deck. The win condition is usually accomplished by casting Thassa's Oracle or Fell the Profane to win the game immediately after the library is empty. The deck is built around speed and consistency in executing its game plan.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Reanimate, then reanimating them to overwhelm the opponent. It also utilizes disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect its combo pieces and control the game. The inclusion of cards like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides additional value and card advantage, while Murktide Regent serves as a powerful threat that can quickly close out the game. The deck aims to win through a fast and efficient combo strategy while disrupting the opponent's game plan.

The deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb, Reanimate, and Thoughtseize, then bringing them back onto the battlefield to overwhelm the opponent. It also includes disruptive spells like Daze and Force of Will to protect the combo and control the game. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Murktide Regent provide card advantage and threats, while Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Archon of Cruelty offer additional ways to close out the game. The deck aims to outpace and outvalue the opponent through its efficient reanimation strategy.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb, Thoughtseize, and Reanimate, and then bring them back onto the battlefield using spells such as Animate Dead and Archon of Cruelty. The deck also includes control elements like Force of Will and Brazen Borrower to protect its combo pieces and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the strategy revolves around efficiently reanimating big threats and overwhelming the opponent with powerful creatures while controlling the game with counterspells and disruption.

The deck focuses on utilizing various spells to quickly fill up the graveyard with powerful creatures, then bringing them back into play with reanimation spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead. Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek help to disrupt the opponent's plans while cards like Murktide Regent and Archon of Cruelty provide powerful threats. The deck also includes counterspells like Force of Will and Daze to protect its combo pieces. Overall, the strategy revolves around quickly assembling a powerful board presence through graveyard manipulation and reanimation tactics.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and powerful enchantments to lock down opponents and deal quick damage. It aims to disrupt the opponent's mana base with cards like Blood Moon and Magus of the Moon while also utilizing cards like Simian Spirit Guide to power out threats early. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with efficient threats like Fury and Pyrogoyf while controlling the game with cards like Chalice of the Void and Sundering Eruption. The deck also utilizes powerful artifacts like The One Ring and Urza's Saga to further enhance its board presence and disrupt the opponent's game plan.

The deck revolves around assembling a combo using Cephalid Illusionist and Nomads en-Kor to fill the graveyard with Narcomoebas and then use Dread Return to bring back Thassa's Oracle for a win condition. The deck includes protection with Force of Will and Swords to Plowshares, along with card selection and manipulation with cards like Brainstorm and Ponder. The lands in the deck support the combo pieces and provide the necessary colors for the spells. The goal is to quickly assemble the combo and win the game before the opponent can disrupt it.

The key concept of this deck is to utilize the synergy between Nadu, Winged Wisdom and Nomads en-Kor to create a powerful combo that can generate card advantage and overwhelm the opponent. By using cards like Green Sun's Zenith and Teferi, Time Raveler to help find key pieces of the combo and protect it with Force of Will, the deck aims to control the game and win through a combination of card draw, protection, and creature tokens. Additionally, cards like Swords to Plowshares and Endurance provide additional utility and disruption to handle various threats.

The deck focuses on quickly playing efficient threats like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Murktide Regent while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Daze and Force of Will. It also includes a mix of burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat to finish off opponents. The deck aims to maintain tempo and pressure the opponent, utilizing its card selection tools like Brainstorm and Ponder to find the right cards at the right time. Additionally, it includes land disruption with Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's mana base.

This deck focuses on assembling the Cephalid Breakfast combo, utilizing cards such as Cephalid Illusionist, Nomads en-Kor, and Nadu, Winged Wisdom to self-mill and win the game with Thassa's Oracle or Dread Return. The deck includes countermagic like Force of Will and Daze to protect the combo, along with card selection spells like Ponder and Brainstorm. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Memory's Journey provide additional card advantage and graveyard manipulation. The deck also includes lands like Urza's Saga and fetch lands to ensure consistent mana production for casting the combo pieces.
